subject: missing baseplate in order
description_text:
order #SSN2670. i ordered the pro x ultra with the throttle, brake, and
baseplate, but i did not receive a baseplate in the package.

conversations.body_text:
i also did not receive the haptic motors i ordered. in my order
confirmation email there is 2 tracking codes but only one of them works.
which is the one i received

Hello, here is your logistics link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045919609203   Additionally, the baseplate is currently out of stock at our US warehouse. We shall dispatch it to you separately once it arrives within the next couple of days.
